DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( exposure trial drug body ) , pharmacodynamics ( effect investigate drug body ) NNC 0123-0000-0338 tablet healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Male subject Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 28 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Known suspect hypersensitivity trial product relate product Presence clinically significant acute gastrointestinal symptom ( e.g . nausea , vomit , heartburn diarrhoea ) within 2 week prior dose , judge trial physician Presence medical condition may confound result trial pose unacceptable risk subject administer trial product , judge trial physician
